sqlMap.select: select re.id as id,re.job_id as job_id,re.start_time as start_time ,re.end_time as end_time,re.result as result,re.status as status,job.name as job_name from spreader.tb_regular_job_result re left join spreader.tb_regular_job job on re.job_id = job.id where re.job_id = #jobId# limit $limit.offset$,$limit.maxRows$

select count(re.id) as cnt from spreader.tb_regular_job_result re left join spreader.tb_regular_job job on re.job_id = job.id
re.job_id = #jobId#
